content: That's really helpful, thanks! I think I'll explore some of those budgeting apps and gift-tracking apps to see which one works best for me. I've been trying to reduce my plastic usage, so it's great to know that there are digital options available. By the way, I've been buying gifts in bulk for upcoming events, like a set of candles for hostess gifts and a few bottles of wine for future dinner parties. Do you have any tips on how to store and organize those gifts so they don't clutter up my space?
